revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS TinkerBoard S.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Single Board Computer - Tinker Board S |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.asus.com/us/Single-Board-Computer/Tinker-Board-S/ |sp = https://www.asus.com/us/Single-Board-Computer/Tinker-Board-S/HelpDesk/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ASUS_Tinker_Board_S |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = Tinker Board |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = S |revision = REV.1.01 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TX2-RTL8723BS |icid = 6317A-RTL8723BS |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3288; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A17 |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H26M52208FPR; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4E8E324EB-EGCF; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 40:9F:38 |oui = 40:9F:38
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;4.4.132;Debian 9;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot(Soldered Down) |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub =
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 2.0, MIPI DSI, Bluetooth 4.0+EDR, Audio 3.5mm out, MIPI CSI, SPDIF, GPIO, SPI |addchip = USB Audio Codec;Realtek;ALC4040;;1; ,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL852G;;1; ,,, Power Management IC w/RTC;Rockchip;RK808-B;;1; ,,, 8Kb I2C Serial EEPROM;STMicroelectronics;M24C08WP;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = linaro |defaultpass = linaro |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android, Armbian
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 01/2018 |estprice = 80 |upc = 889349946978 |ean = 4712900946970 |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIA6ZP8PP4888 |asin = B00FS83U42 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Realtek RTL8723BS Combo Module (SDIO) |rad1modif = SDIO |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8723BS; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3288 @1.8 GHz Quad Core SoC *RAM: 2GB Dual Channel DDR3 (LPDDR3) *Storage: 16GB eMMC *GPU: Mali-T764 @600 MHz
===Requirement=== *Micro SD card with at least 8GB capacity *Micro USB cable and a 5V/2A USB power adapter with LPS marking *Monitor with HDMI cable, Keyboard and Mouse set
==Links of Interest== *https://www.asus.com/us/Single-Board-Computer/Tinker-Board-S/HelpDesk_Download/ *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asus_Tinker_Board ''Asus Tinker Board'' on '''Wikipedia''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/asus-tinker-board-s-adds-16gb-emmc-and-more/ ''Asus Tinker Board S'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://blog.hackster.io/the-new-tinker-board-s-ea4ff8a21307 ''The New Tinker Board S'' on '''hackster.io'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/01/09/asus-tinker-board-s-adds-16gb-emmc-flash-to-sell-for-79-99/ ''ASUS Tinker Board S'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ]
